live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
61687.summary: Some customers in the Rockwood area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
61687.title: May 29 - Winnipeg (Rockwood) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
